org.floracore.api.extension

接口 ExtensionManager

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SimpleExtensionManager

    public interface ExtensionManager
    Manages extensions.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      @NonNull @Unmodifiable java.util.Collection<Extension> getLoadedExtensions()
      Gets a collection of all loaded extensions.
      void loadExtension(Extension extension)
      Loads the given extension.
      @NonNull Extension loadExtension(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Loads the extension at the given path.

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadExtension

        void loadExtension(Extension extension)
        Loads the given extension.
        参数:
        extension - the extension to load

      • loadExtension

        @NonNull Extension loadExtension(java.nio.file.Path path)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the extension at the given path.
        参数:
        path - the path to the extension
        返回:
        the extension
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the extension could not be loaded

      • getLoadedExtensions

        @NonNull @Unmodifiable java.util.Collection<Extension> getLoadedExtensions()
        Gets a collection of all loaded extensions.
        返回:
        the loaded extensions
